docs.summary: Manage the domain registration process through Wix.

permissions.name: Manage Domains
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the account's connected domains.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a `domainRegistration` object.

> __Important:__ This call requires an account level API key and cannot be authenticated with the standard authorization header.

permissions.name: Manage Domains
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the account's connected domains.

params.name: domainRegistration
params.doc: Information about the domain to register and the contact details.

docs.summary:
Creates a `domainRegistration` object and starts the domain registration process.


You must pass the relevant Wix account ID in the header of the call. 
You may also pass a Wix site ID in the header, this assigns the domain to 
the site when the registration succeeds.

You can only register a domain to a Wix site with an active 
[Premium plan](https://support.wix.com/en/article/upgrading-your-site-to-premium-3066683) 
that supports domains with the chosen TLD. 
Use the [Create Package endpoint](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/account-level-apis/resellers/packages/create-package-v2) 
of the Resellers API to add such a Premium plan to your customer's site. Contact the 
[Wix B2B sales team](mailto:bizdev@wix.com) 
for details about the correct `productID` in the Create Package call for 
different TLDs. 

You can only register a root domain, you can't register a subdomain.

If you try to register a domain that isn't available for purchase or there 
is already a `domainRegistration` object for the specified domain, the call 
fails without creating a `domainRegistration` object or starting the 
registration process.

Wix tries to register the domain several times, 
but stops in case the process fails too often. Contact the 
[Wix B2B team](mailto:bizdev@wix.com) 
for more information about the number of attemps and their timing.

Wix only checks formal requirements of each field in the `contact` object, such as 
the maximum number of characters. Wix doesn't check whether the actual domain registrar has 
additional requirements, for example that the postal code is valid in the 
specified country. If there is such a mismatch between the request and the 
registrar's requirements, the 
[Register Domain](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/premium/domainregistration/register-domain) 
call still succeeds, but the external provider may 
not deliver the domain. Then, you aren't immediately notified that the domain 
can't be delivered but only after the last attempt to register the domain has 
failed. You can read more in the 
[Contact Field Validations article](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/premium/domainregistration/contact-field-validations).

> __Important:__ This call requires an account level API key and cannot be authenticated with the standard authorization header.
Triggered when a `domainRegistration` object is created.
Triggered when a `domainRegistration` object is updated.

docs.summary:
A domain registration object contains information about the domain name and 
[TLD](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Top-level_domain) to 
purchase. It also includes contact details and the status of the
registration process.

members.name: domain
members.doc:
Name of the domain including the
[TLD](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Top-level_domain).
Subdomains aren't supported, you can only register a root domain.
Domain name and TLD must be separated by a dot. For example,
`my-new-domain.com`. Only alphanumeric characters, hyphens, and dots are
supported. The domain name has these limits:

Min: 3 characters
Max: 63 characters

members.name: productInstanceId
members.doc:
ID of the product instance from the
[Resellers API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/account-level-apis/resellers/introduction)
that belongs to the `domainRegistration` object. You can't register a domain
for a free Wix site. Therefore, you must assign a Premium plan that supports
domains with the relevant TLD to the site before starting the domain
registration process. You can use the
[Resellers API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/account-level-apis/resellers/introduction)
to create such a Premium package. Contact the
[Wix B2B team](mailto:bizdev@wix.com)
for more information about how to become a reseller and which `productId`
includes which TLDs.

members.name: contacts
members.doc:
Contact details for the registrant, admin, and tech support of the domain to register.
You can read more about which
[Contact Field Validations](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/premium/domainsearch/contact-field-validations)
are implemented.

members.name: siteId
members.doc:
ID of the Wix site to assign the domain to. The `siteID` must match the site ID of the
`productInstance` belonging to the related
[reseller package](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/account-level-apis/resellers/packages/package-object).

members.name: assignAs
members.doc:
Whether the domain is assigned as a primary domain or a redirect.
Read more about [primary and redirected domains](https://support.wix.com/en/article/switching-your-primary-and-redirected-domains).
__Note:__ When you connect a domain or subdomain, you aren't allowed to pass `UNKNOWN_ASSIGN_AS` in the request.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Status of the domain registration process.

+ `UNKNOWN_STATUS`: The status of the domain registration process couldn't be retrieved.
+ `NEW`: The `domainRegistration` object has been created but Wix hasn't yet attempted to register the domain.
+ `IN_PROGRESS`: Wix has started the domain registration process, but the domain hasn't been successfully registered yet.
+ `REGISTERED`: The domain has been registered successfully.
+ `FAILED`: Wix has tried to register the domain, but has stopped the process due to too many failed attempts. Contact the [Wix B2B team](mailto:bizdev@wix.com) for more information.
+ `CANCELED`: The registration can be canceled by reseller. Contact the [Wix B2B team](mailto:bizdev@wix.com) for more information.

members.name: latestAttempt
members.doc:
Information about the latest attempt to register
the domain. Wix tries to register the domain several times, in case the
first attempt is unsuccessful. You can contact the
[Wix B2B team](mailto:bizdev@wix.com)
for more information about the number of attempts and their timing.

members.name: failure
members.doc: Failure object. Only present for status `FAILED`. Describes why the registration `FAILED`.

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the `domainRegistration` object was created.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the `domainRegistration` object was last updated.

members.name: revision
members.doc:
Revision number, which increments by 1 each time the domain registration is updated.
To prevent conflicting changes,
the current revision must be passed when updating the domain registration.

Ignored when creating a domain registration.

members.name: icannConfirmationStatus
members.doc: ICANN confirmation status

members.name: icannConfirmationStatusInfo
members.doc: ICANN confirmation status info

members.name: dnsPropagationStatus
members.doc: Dns propagation status

members.name: expirationDate
members.doc: Expiration date

members.name: code
members.doc: Failure code.

members.name: message
members.doc: Failure message.

members.name: number
members.doc: Number of the latest attempt to register the domain.

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: Date and time of the latest domain registration attempt.

members.name: registrant
members.doc: Contact information for the domain registrant.

members.name: admin
members.doc: Contact information for the domain admin.

members.name: tech
members.doc: Contact information for the tech support of the domain.

members.name: firstName
members.doc:
First name. Only
[alphanumerical characters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alphanumericals)
are supported.

Min: 2 characters
Max: 64 characters

members.name: lastName
members.doc:
Last name. Only
[alphanumerical characters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alphanumericals)
are supported.

Min: 2 characters
Max: 64 characters

members.name: email
members.doc:
Email address.  Only
[alphanumerical characters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alphanumericals)
and a single `@` are supported. Wix doesn't validate that the email address
exists.

Min: 3 characters
Max: 64 characters before the `@` and 63 after

members.name: address
members.doc:
Address details, including street name and house number. Only
[alphanumerical characters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alphanumericals)
are supported.

Min: 2 characters
Max: 64 characters

members.name: city
members.doc:
City. Only
[alphanumerical characters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alphanumericals)
are supported.

Min: 2 characters
Max: 64 characters

members.name: subdivisionCode
members.doc:
Subdivision code in
[ISO-3166 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Officially_assigned_code_elements)
format. Only
[alphanumerical characters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alphanumericals)
are supported.

Min: 2 characters
Max: 2 characters

members.name: postalCode
members.doc:
Postal code. Only
[alphanumerical characters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alphanumericals)
are supported.

Min: 2 characters
Max: 16 characters

members.name: countryCode
members.doc:
Country code in
[ISO-3166 alpha-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2#Subdivisions_included_in_ISO_3166-1)
format. Only
[alphanumerical characters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alphanumericals)
are supported. Wix doesn't validate that the postal code is valid for the
given country.

Min: 2 characters
Max: 2 characters

members.name: phone
members.doc:
Phone number. Only
[alphanumerical characters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alphanumericals)
are supported. For example, `+15551234567`. Wix doesn't validate that the
phone number belongs to the specified country.

Min: 2 characters
Max: 20 characters

members.name: company
members.doc:
Company name. Only
[alphanumerical characters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alphanumericals)
are supported.

Max: 2 characters
Max: 64 characters

members.name: domainRegistration
members.doc: Information about the domain to register and the contact details.

members.name: domainRegistration
members.doc: Created `domainRegistration` object.

members.name: domain
members.doc: Name of the domain

members.name: domainRegistration
members.doc: Retrieved `domainRegistration` object.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_STATUS
  • NEW
  • IN_PROGRESS
  • REGISTERED
  • FAILED
  • CANCELED

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_ASSIGN_AS
  • PRIMARY
  • REDIRECT

the confirmation status types, a record: starts at pending ends either at confirmed_by_all or expired Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_ICANN_CONFIRMATION_STATUS
  • PENDING
  • CONFIRMED_BY_ALL
  • EXPIRED

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_DNS_PROPAGATION_STATUS
  • COMPLETED
  • FAILED
  • IN_PROGRESS
